snippet: President Vladimir V. Putin kept Chancellor Angela Merkel waiting for hours, met after 2 a.m. with Silvio Berlusconi, and joked at a news conference, but budged little on the Ukraine crisis.
abstract: Russian Pres Vladimir V Putin, in Milan for Asia-Europe summit meeting, comes face-to face with Ukraine Pres Petro O Poroshenko, and shows little appetite to deliver any major breakthroughs; German Chancellor Angela Merkel and British Prime Min David Cameron express frustration as Putin continues to refuse to budge on any of his contested policies toward Ukraine.

byline.original: By JIM YARDLEY and DAVID M. HERSZENHORN
byline.contributor: Jim Yardley reported from Milan, and David. M. Herszenhorn from Moscow. Gaia Pianigiani contributed reporting from Milan.

lead_paragraph: President Vladimir V. Putin kept Chancellor Angela Merkel waiting for hours, met after 2 a.m. with Silvio Berlusconi, and joked at a news conference, but budged little on the Ukraine crisis.

headline.main: Making Merkel Wait, Finding Time for Truffles
headline.print_headline: Making Merkel Wait, Finding Time for Truffles
